Package md

Provides the classes to manage the information of MD system (residue, segment, box).

    Class Description
    ANResolver
    Resolves the atomic number from the label

    BuilderException

Package md Description

Provides the classes to manage the information of MD system (residue, segment, box).
The classes in this package manage the following information:
  1. Box: Box size and angles, and symmetry group (i.e., the information of CRYST1).
  2. Residue: name, ID, and list of atoms.
  3. Segment: name and list of residues.
I/O sets for PDB and other formats are also provided.
Since:
Sindo 3.6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kiyoshi Yagi
